attributes.review: When I went in to the app all I seen  was a fat orange blob of my phone.and if u ask me how i rate this app I would not even give it a hole star I would give it a half star.andWhen I open the app it just gives me knots in my stomach.🤬🤬🤬🤬 WORLD’S UGLIEST 🤮🤮🤮APP!!!!!!!! 😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: i logged on and was shocked at what i saw. i don’t understand how this disgusting man can hold the office, when he can’t even design a decent app. overall, very disappointed 🤢🤢🤢 also F**K TRUMP!!!!🤬🇺🇸

attributes.review: When i first downloaded this app I was SO excited to learn about President Trump😻 I wanted to show my mom how cool and fun and loving he is🥺🤗 but when i showed her🤨 the app called her a b*tch!!😡😡 It then took her by the hair and dragged her across the room🤭😭😭😭 I heard it yell out "stupid f*cking dinosaur" 🙄 this app is so immature
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!!!

attributes.review:
So I already wrote out an entire review but it didn’t send 😡 I was high when I wrote it so maybe it was my fault but I don’t think so. Any who, I’ll just summarize the bit. 

I’m a trump supporter! This app however was a HUGE failure! I know many apps that have done well, believe me, and frankly I can believe it is such a terrible app. Some people ask me, why can’t the app be better and I say, you know... idk some other dumb stuff. Anyway, I can’t be loudly racist anymore😢 I want to be able to say offensive things without consequences again! Trump has me eating out of the palm of his small little hands!  In order to go into the app, I needed to provide my phone number, which I didn’t want because China could get it. BUT because I love Trumps small c*ck in my mouth so much,  I did it for him🥺 Then instead of seeing Trump, I see pictures of human feces all over and eventually I went blind.

End of bit. Maybe it got taken down bc I swore to much? Huh, well whatever, can’t wait for November! See everyone there!
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!!

attributes.review: After I downloaded it it asked for my cc numbers, my address and other very personal stuff it wiped all my data. Kept wanting to charge $25.00 and kept sending stuff in the mail to pay $30 for trump to get food. DONT DOWN THE APP
attributes.title: terrible DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: I suggest you don’t not download this app it took 7 months to download but not only that it hacked my phone and started posting my horrible selfies online also the alexa girl just started talking out of nowhere playing an trump ad and then I hear sum and it’s trump on tv telling me to vote like said my name and everything then he sent the chuck.e. Cheese animatronics and I know there around here somewhere but I suggest you don’t download it for the safety of you and also if you have children
